result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Corey C Kowalewski

defendant.name: Kowalewski, Corey C
defendant.address: 1236 South 54th Street, Lower, West Milwaukee, WI 53214

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Corey C Kowalewski in court with attorney Ramon Arellano Valdez.  Defendant Corey C Kowalewski in custody.  Matthew G. Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
AS TO COUTNS 1, 2 & 3
Pursuant to plea negotiations, on a motion from the state the court ordered Counts 1, 2 & 3 Dismissed, But Read In for sentencing to 14CM104 & 14CM1254. Court vacated jury trial date.

Attorney Ramon A Valdez in court, defendant Corey C Kowalewski not in court, in custody.  Matthew G Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant NOT produced. Parties working toward resolution, request a Plea & Sentencing date prior to Jury Trial date. Case adjourned for Plea & Sentencing & Jury Trial.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 9, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Corey C Kowalewski in court with attorney Ramon A Valdez.  Matthew G Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case set for Preliminary Hearing. Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing. Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver, received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial before Judge Grady, Branch 23. Original Information, received and filed. Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading. Defendant plead not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 23. Court GRANTED Joinder of 14CF1464, 14CM1254 & 14CM104. Case set for Final Pretrial & Jury Trial.

Attorney Ramon A Valdez NOT in court, defendant Corey C Kowalewski not in court, in custody. FILE NOT IN COURT. Matthew G Puthukulam appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant NOT produced. Defense counsel contacted the court to advise that he is out of town, and was unaware of appointment. Court WAIVED Preliminary Hearing time limits due to counsel's unavailability. Case adjourned for Preliminary Hearing in branch 23.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 24, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Sarah N.

Defendant Corey C Kowalewski in court with attorney Victoria M. McCandless.  Defendant Corey C Kowalewski in custody.  Paul L. Tiffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grady, Branch 23. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  Defendant withholds plea as to misdemeanor counts 2 and 3 at this time.
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 17, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
